Uses of booleanSemaphore in arlut.csd.ganymede.common
 

Fields in arlut.csd.ganymede.common declared as booleanSemaphore
private  booleanSemaphore scheduleHandle.isRunning
          This booleanSemaphore will be set to true if the task associated with this scheduleHandle is currently running.
private  booleanSemaphore scheduleHandle.rerun
          This booleanSemaphore will be set to true if we are doing a on-demand and we get a request while running it, which signifies that we'll want to immediately re-run it on completion.
private  booleanSemaphore scheduleHandle.suspend
          This booleanSemaphore will be set to true if the task associated with this scheduleHandle is currently suspended.
 

Uses of booleanSemaphore in arlut.csd.ganymede.server
 

Fields in arlut.csd.ganymede.server declared as booleanSemaphore
private  booleanSemaphore SyncRunner.active
          This semaphore controls whether or not this SyncRunner will attempt to write out transactions.
private  booleanSemaphore GanymedeXMLSession.cleanedup
          Semaphore to gate the cleanup() method.
private  booleanSemaphore DBEditObject.commitSemaphore
          true if this object has had its commitPhase1() method called, but has not yet had its commitPhase2() or release() methods called.
private  booleanSemaphore GanymedeSession.loggedInSemaphore
          If true, the user is currently logged in.
private  booleanSemaphore SyncRunner.needBuild
          This variable is true if we've seen a transaction that requires us to issue a build on the next run().
private  booleanSemaphore GanymedeXMLSession.parsing
          This flag is used to track whether the background parser thread is active.
private  booleanSemaphore DBObjectBase.writeInProgress
          Boolean semaphore monitoring whether or not this DBObjectBase is currently locked for writing.
